message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is worth more than $80 to me, reflecting its high-quality materials and innovative design. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am offering it to you for $95. I believe this price reflects the true value and investment you're making in acquiring this product.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you outlining the product's value. However, $95 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product, considering its potential benefits. Let me know if this price works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I would like to propose a price of $90 for the product. This still reflects its high value and quality, while being more accommodating to your budget. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.

Alice, I appreciate you adjusting the price. However, $90 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $85, but that's my absolute limit. This price reflects my budget constraints while recognizing the value you've described in the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your budget constraints. In an effort to reach an agreement, I would like to propose a final price of $87 for the product. This price still acknowledges the value and quality of the item while being more aligned with your current budget. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.
